subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: The charges against Graham B. Spanier, which include perjury, come as authorities examine how Penn State officials handled allegations of child sexual abuse involving Jerry Sandusky.
snippet: The charges against Graham B. Spanier, which include perjury, come as authorities examine how Penn State officials handled allegations of child sexual abuse involving Jerry Sandusky.
